name: Slackagent Activities
description: Temporal activities for Slackagent ticket creation workflow including vector DB search, Jira integration, LLM processing, and ticket creation

activities.name: read_from_vector_db_activity
activities.description: Searches vector database for relevant context using semantic similarity

activities.name: read_from_jira_activity
activities.description: Retrieves issues from Jira project using JQL queries

activities.name: call_llm_for_ticket_details_activity
activities.description: Uses LLM to generate structured ticket details from context and user request

activities.name: create_jira_ticket_activity
activities.description: Creates new Jira ticket with generated details

activities.name: log_workflow_result_activity
activities.description: Logs workflow execution results for monitoring and debugging
